results.title: AMPK Phosphorylation Modulates Pain by Activation of NLRP3 Inflammasome.
results.text_hl: Deficient @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation and overactivation of @GENE_DFNA34 @GENE_114548 @@@NLRP3@@@ inflammasome axis were also observed in blood cells from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@fibromyalgia@@@ (@DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@), a prevalent @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Chronic_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain disease@@@. In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (200 mg/daily), which increased @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation, restored all biochemical alterations examined by us in blood cells and significantly improved clinical symptoms, such as, @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@, @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@, @DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@disturbed sleep@@@, and tender @<m>DISEASE_Belonephobia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000719195 @@@points@@@, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@.

citations.NLM: Bullón P, Alcocer-Gómez E, Carrión AM, Marín-Aguilar F, Garrido-Maraver J, Román-Malo L, Ruiz-Cabello J, Culic O, Ryffel B, Apetoh L, Ghiringhelli F, Battino M, Sánchez-Alcazar JA, Cordero MD. AMPK Phosphorylation Modulates Pain by Activation of NLRP3 Inflammasome. Antioxid Redox Signal. 2016 Jan 20;24(3):157-70. PMID: 26132721
